18#include <string>
19
20namespace ZXing {
21
22enum class CharacterSet;
23
24namespace QRCode {
25
26enum class ErrorCorrectionLevel;
27class EncodeResult;
28
29/**
30* @author satorux@google.com (Satoru Takabayashi) - creator
31* @author dswitkin@google.com (Daniel Switkin) - ported from C++
32*/
33class Encoder
34{
35public:
36 /**
37 * @param content text to encode
38 * @param ecLevel error correction level to use
39 * @param maskPattern Mask patern to use or -1 for automatically chosen pattern
40 * @return {@link QRCode} representing the encoded QR code
41 * @throws WriterException if encoding can't succeed, because of for example invalid content
42 * or configuration
43 */
44 static EncodeResult Encode(const std::wstring& content, ErrorCorrectionLevel ecLevel, CharacterSet encoding, int versionNumber, bool useGs1Format, int maskPattern);
45};
46
47} // QRCode
48} // ZXing
49
